```{r}
filter(gapminder,  lifeExp < 30)

```

```{r}
select(gapminder, country, year, pop)
filter(gapminder, year == 2007)
```

```{r}
select(gapminder, -continent) %>%
  filter(year == 2007)
```

```{r}
gapminder %>%

  arrange(desc(gdp))
```
